channel.title: Computing on oyzad's desktop
channel.description: Recent content in Computing on oyzad's desktop

item.title: Programs and Equipment
item.description:
Here are all of the programs that I use, all of which I have been using for a long time.

Software

Operating System

  • I use Macos on my macbook pro
  • void on my rasberry pi which. It uses runit instead of systemd

Terminal

  • I use kitty on both OS.

Shell

  • I use zsh as my shell. It has very much of the same features as bash but with better plugins for autocompletion. I have OhMyZsh installed.

Window Manager/Desktop Environment
